imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Circular logo with winged emblem, KARTHIKEYAN BIKE SHOWROOM text, silver metallic styling on black background with chrome border (karthikeyan-logo.dim_200x200.png)

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the circular winged logo image in the Header component (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]) with the user-uploaded logo design showing the KARTHIKEYAN BIKE SHOWROOM branding with winged emblem and silver metallic styling

Update any logo references in the selected page elements (XPaths: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2], /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1], /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1]) to use the new uploaded logo design if they reference the logo image
